Html:
I have been looking for a good comprehensive guide for TFS 2008. This guide here for TFS 2005 looks like exactly what I am looking for. How well do the concepts in this guide map to TFS 2008. Or is there a guide out there already and I am just not finding it? I would assume most of the guide is still relevant, but I assume it is missing items that I would want to consider for my 2008 implementation?

Thanks for any help you all may provide.

Hi,  After getting through the document and writing down some points to ask the vendors helping us set this up, I realized there is a section in here showing the improvements for TFS 2008.  Thanks a lot.  This is a great document.
